Line and Shadow

sessions.subtitle: Choose the session that fits your vision
sessions.guarantee: All sessions include aftercare kit and free touch-up within 6 weeks

testimonials.quote: Kai's blackwork is incredible, the solid fills are so clean and the design flow is perfect. Exactly what I wanted.
testimonials.author: Marcus T.

testimonials.quote: Really happy with my fine line piece, the detail work is amazing. Healing perfectly too.
testimonials.author: Beth K.

paragraphs: Started tattooing in a mate's garage back in 2019, now running one of Leeds' most focused studios. I specialise in two styles and I do them properly - bold blackwork that'll look sharp for decades, and fine line work so precise you'll think it was drawn with a technical pen.
No flash sheets here. Every piece is designed specifically for you, your body, your story. I take on fewer clients so I can spend proper time on each design. Quality over quantity, always.
about.callout: Each tattoo is a custom piece designed specifically for you
about.imageAlt: Kai working on a detailed blackwork tattoo at Test Leeds Studio

items.question: Do you do walk-ins?
items.answer: I take a few walk-ins each week for smaller fine line pieces, but blackwork sessions are appointment only. Best to message me on Instagram to check availability.

items.question: How much for a sleeve?
items.answer: Depends on the style and complexity. Blackwork sleeves typically run £800-1200 over multiple sessions. Fine line sleeves are usually £600-900. I'll give you a proper quote after we discuss your design.

items.question: What's your booking deposit?
items.answer: £50 deposit to secure your slot, comes off your final bill. Non-refundable but you can reschedule with 48 hours notice.

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo idea and we'll get back to you within 24 hours
booking.successMessage: Thanks for your interest. Kai will review your request and get back to you within 24 hours to discuss your design and confirm your appointment.

footer.tagline: Precision blackwork and fine line tattoos
